name: build_story_scenarios
description: Build story graph with scenarios added to each story (with optional examples for data-driven testing when decision criteria chosen)
process: Load existing story graph from project area
For each story in graph, analyze acceptance criteria
Add test metadata to story: test_file (path to test file), test_class (test class name), test_line (line number of test class)
For each scenario, add test metadata: test_method (test method name matching scenario), test_line (line number of test method)
IF decision criteria = 'Yes': Identify scenarios needing data variation and add Examples tables to those scenarios
Add scenarios to story in graph (some scenarios will have examples field for data-driven testing)
Save updated story graph to project area
